# Strategy: SSO, Energy, Chips, Commodities ? (Invest Copy)
Source: https://app.composer.trade/symphony/tCu5bdNyx1cSriFS1KVJ/details

**Complexity**: Medium (4/10)
**Category**: Tactical

## Trading Universe
This strategy can trade 8 assets:

• **Stocks**: VIXM, SOXX, NVDA, AMD, SSO, DBC, XLE, ENPH

## Strategy Settings
• **Rebalancing**: Daily
• **Initial Capital**: USD 100,000
• **Trading Fees**: 0.10% per trade

## Investment Logic

```
• Equal Weight Allocation:
  ◦ Black Swan Catcher:
    ▪ Equal Weight Allocation:
      - If :
        - If VIXM's RSI (Relative Strength Index) (40-day) is greater than 69.0:
          - Buy VIXM (100% of portfolio)
        - Else branch:
          - Rotator:
            - Equal Weight Allocation:
              - Select the top 1 asset by returns (90-day) from: SOXX, NVDA, AMD, SSO, DBC, XLE, ENPH
```

## Technical Details
• **Source Platform**: Composer
• **Source ID**: tCu5bdNyx1cSriFS1KVJ
• **Created**: June 27, 2025
• **Slippage Model**: 0.10% per trade
